aboutPage.title: Welcome to
aboutPage.subtitle: We're not just a brand—we're a movement. Redefining quality, style, and sustainability for the modern generation.
aboutPage.story_p1: Founded in 2020, we started with a simple vision: to create products that don't compromise on quality, style, or ethics. From a small studio, we've grown into a trusted brand serving thousands worldwide.
aboutPage.story_p2: Every product we offer is carefully curated to blend contemporary design with timeless elegance. We believe in quality over quantity, sustainability over trends, and authenticity over imitation.
aboutPage.story_p3: Our mission goes beyond commerce—we're building a community of conscious consumers who value craftsmanship, ethical practices, and meaningful connections.
aboutPage.cta_subtitle: Experience quality that makes a difference. Shop our latest collection and discover why thousands trust us.

values.passion_desc: We pour our hearts into every design, ensuring each piece reflects our love for fashion.
values.quality_desc: Premium materials and meticulous attention to detail in every step.
values.sustainability_desc: Committed to eco-friendly practices and ethical sourcing.
values.innovation_desc: Constantly evolving while staying true to timeless aesthetics.
values.community_desc: Building meaningful connections with our customers.
values.excellence_desc: Never settling for good enough—we strive for perfection.
